EN.heading: Knowledge Center
EN.title: High-lift centrifugal pumps HPH and HPL
EN.subtitle: Circular solutions for your multipurpose needs
EN.content: The HPH and HPL are multistage ring section pumps, designed for operation at two or four pole motor speed. They are suitable for pumping clear or slightly polluted water with abrasive particles.
